column1: Doderic Brandybuck was a Hobbit of the Shire.
Doderic was a son of Seredic Brandybuck and Hilda Bracegirdle. He attended Bilbos Farewell Party.
Since it belongs to a Brandybuck
column2: the name is Celtic-sounding. However it is perhaps a form of Germanic Wikipedia:Theuderic meaning "people reign".Jim Allan (ed.)
